Interface PluginProxy

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()

        Gets the installed version of the plugin.

        Version getServerVersion()

        Gets the server version this plugin is currently running on.

        Tries to find a version compatible class.

      • resolve

        <S> S resolve(java.lang.Class<S> service)

        Gets a business logic from the BlockBall plugin. All types in the service package can be accessed. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the service could not be found.

        See Also:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • create

        <E> E create(java.lang.Class<E> entity)

        Creates a new entity from the given entity. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the entity could not be found.

        See Also:
        entity, IllegalArgumentException
